product.name: L'Oreal Paris Infallible Never Fail Eye Liner
product.description: Enjoy beautifully defined eyes for up to 16 hours! New Infallible Never Fail Eyeliner is L'Oreal's most advanced mechanical liner with superior long-wearing technology. The rich and creamy formula glides on easily and evenly and sets quickly for fade-proof colour. Use the bulit-in smudger and sharper to create versatile eyeliner looks for any occasion.
